page.title: 12Superior International Ltd
page.content: There is a big warehouse in{Offord {Cluny}covering 12 acres of ground.It is called Superior International.It has been there for 20 years.About 150 local people work there.They{package {fruit & vegetables.}They work every day of the year except Christmas day.They get fruit from Spain,Holland, South Africa,America & Italy.Thousands of cases of{grapefruit,oranges,lemons, {apples,melons,lettuces,cucumbers & {tomatoes}arrive every day.They come mostly in refrigerated lorries but some come by rail. The packaging is done by machine.The fruit is priced, then it goes by lorry to{supermarkets all over the country.Some goes to big {markets}in such places as London, Bristol and Birmingham.
